> The diff coverage is `97.36%`.

[![Impacted file tree graph](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/17215/graphs/tree.svg?token=eZ4WkYLtcO&src=pr&height=150&width=650)](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/17215?src=pr&el=tree)

##           master   #17215      +/-   ##
==========================================
- Coverage   91.02%   90.98%   -0.05%     
==========================================
  Files         162      162              
  Lines       49517    49539      +22     
==========================================
  Hits        45075    45075              
- Misses       4442     4464      +22
```

|---|---|---|

| [pandas/core/frame.py](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/17215?src=pr&el=tree#diff-cGFuZGFzL2NvcmUvZnJhbWUucHk=) | `97.72% <100%> (-0.1%)` | :arrow_down: |
